snippet: Michelle DeFeo, executive vice president of Laurent-Perrier Champagne in the United States, actually enjoys going through passport control.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Laurent-Perrier Champagne executive vice president Michelle DeFeo discussing her flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Michelle DeFeo, executive vice president of Laurent-Perrier Champagne in the United States, actually enjoys going through passport control.

headline.seo: With Champagne as Entry, Passport Control Is Easy
headline.main: With Champagne as a Calling Card, Passport Control Is Effusive
headline.print_headline: Champagne as Calling Card? Passport Control Is Effusive
